mapper.select: SELECT shw_num shw_num, shw_movieNum shw_movieNum, shw_movieName shw_movieName, shw_screenNum shw_screenNum, shw_screenName shw_screenName, shw_date shw_date, shw_time shw_time, shw_seatCnt shw_seatCnt, shw_seatRow shw_seatRow, shw_seatLine shw_seatLine, shw_expireFlag shw_expireFlag FROM tb_showinfo WHERE shw_movieNum=#{mov_num}
